@package coqtop-elaborate
@version 0.1.0.0

module Language.Coq.Lexer
type P = forall st. Parsec String st ()
type Pc = forall st. Parsec String st Char
satisfyCat :: [GeneralCategory] -> Pc
satisfyRanges :: [(Char, Char)] -> Pc
unicodeLetter :: Pc
unicodeIdPart :: Pc
coqString :: P
coqInteger :: P
coqDef :: LanguageDef st
bullets :: P
identifier :: ParsecT String u Identity String

module Language.Coq.Parser
peekSat :: (Char -> Bool) -> P
vernacControl :: P
coqSentence :: P
sentencePart :: P
endOfSentence :: P
zeroPos :: SourcePos
breakSentence :: (SourcePos, String) -> (String, (SourcePos, String))

module CoqTop
coqtop :: [String] -> String -> IO [Either String String]
